类的使用
org.springframework.web.reactive.config.ResourceChainRegistration

  • 使用ResourceChainRegistration的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.web.reactive.config
    Spring WebFlux configuration infrastructure.

    • org.springframework.web.reactive.config中ResourceChainRegistration的使用

      返回ResourceChainRegistration的org.springframework.web.reactive.config中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ResourceChainRegistration ResourceChainRegistration.addResolver(ResourceResolver resolver)
      Add a resource resolver to the chain.
      ResourceChainRegistration ResourceChainRegistration.addTransformer(ResourceTransformer transformer)
      Add a resource transformer to the chain.
      ResourceChainRegistration ResourceHandlerRegistration.resourceChain(boolean cacheResources)
      Configure a chain of resource resolvers and transformers to use.
      ResourceChainRegistration ResourceHandlerRegistration.resourceChain(boolean cacheResources, Cache cache)
      Configure a chain of resource resolvers and transformers to use.
